name: Project: Flight
description:
DISCLAIMER: THIS PROJECT HAS BARELY BEEN STARTED, SO KEEP YOUR EXPECTATIONS LOW

What is this game?
A 2D pixel-art platformer (very original, I know)

What does it already have?
You can double-jump and you can die by jumping into the void or spikes and that's about it.

What do I plan on doing with it?
I want to create a polished game with a playtime of about an hour or less. I also want to experiment with art, but most of all, I just want to finish it.

Why is it called "Project: Flight"?
I put "Project:" at the beginning, because it sounded kinda cool and I added "Flight", because I saw a dove fly by while I was trying to think of an appropriate title.

You can reach me at:
Discord (Quinn#2463)
